thread.title: 16 Feel-Good Winter Accessories

author: Lori Keong
title: 16 Feel-Good Winter Accessories
text:
View Slideshow
Though it's not quite cold enough to justify wearing a beanie and scarf during your commute, it's never too early to start shopping for the accessories that will keep you from freezing come snow season. This winter, invest in scarves, hats, gloves, and socks that won't sacrifice warmth or aesthetics. We've rounded up 16 accessories that marry comfort and design: socks with chic color-blocking, Catherine Baba –worthy cashmere turbans, buttery leather gloves, and blanketlike scarves for peak winter contentment. Click through to see all of our picks.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
